description:
Summary
Rimkus is currently seeking an experienced Mechanical Engineer with broad experience in the design of residential and commercial HVAC systems. A general experience and knowledge with energy modelling for residential construction would be an asset.
In return for your talent and effort, we offer our full-time employees a competitive benefits package – including medical, dental, vision, life insurance, disability insurance, employer-matching RRSP, a flexible work schedule and opportunities for advancement.
Major Duties & Responsibilities

 Apply technical knowledge to design HVAC and plumbing systems for new and existing buildings
 Assist clients in extending the life cycle of their MEP systems by establishing maintenance and operations procedures
 Complete due diligence assessments of existing mechanical systems
 Perform energy audits and quality assurance testing
 Review of existing storm systems as part of re-roofing projects and site drainage rehabilitation
 Design modifications to existing storm systems to meet roof drainage requirements
 Support our client’s commissioning and retro-commissioning efforts
 Manage several projects simultaneously and be detail oriented
 Other assigned duties and tasks, as required

Requirements & Qualifications

 Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering with P.Eng. license in Ontario, with the ability to become licensed in additional provinces
 Minimum 8 years of relevant experience
 Written and verbal English skills must be excellent
 Proficiency with AutoCAD and Microsoft Office Suite
 Must possess and maintain valid driver’s license and personal vehicle for attending work sites
 Ability to work effectively both independently and in a team environment
 Demonstrated willingness to be flexible and adaptable to changing priorities
 Self-motivating and ability to multi-task while maintaining a strong attention to detail
 Ability to act with business integrity and professionalism
 Physical ability to carry ladders and work safely from heights
 Ability to use power tools and equipment for investigation work
 Flexible work hours are required for evenings and weekends when instructed by management
 Must have vehicle suitable for carrying ladders and tools

How to Apply
Note that while all submissions will be reviewed, only those that are to be considered for an interview will be contacted.
Rimkus is an equal opportunity employer. Accommodation is available for applicants selected for an interview.
